abilities.title: Blood Tracker
abilities.description: Wolfen track blood scent up to 500 ft (152 m). Base Skill: 20% +4% per level of experience. Nightvision 40 ft (12.2 m), excellent day vision (human norm).

abilities.title: Scent Familiarity
abilities.description: Wolfen recognize and follow familiar scents up to 50 ft (15 m). Base Skill: 16% +4% per level; +10% for mate/offspring. Roll every 100 ft (30.5 m); failure loses the trail.

abilities.title: Keen Hearing
abilities.description: Wolfen hearing is as keen as a dogâ€™s, with the same range, enhancing their awareness in combat and tracking.

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +1 on initiative, +2 to save vs horror factor. Punch/claw 2D4 +P.S. bonus, kick 2D6 +P.S. bonus, bite 2D4 (no P.S. bonus).
